categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: A Rebel Base on Naboo's moon of Rori was in operation during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The base was located in a mountainous region of the Asworal Everglades, a considerable distance south of the city of Narmle. After the Battle of Yavin, the base was led by General Garax Hadriin of the Rebel Alliance to Restore the Republic. Rebel Officer Wolff Kalos was also affected to this base.

The Rebel Base on Rori was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. The Rebel Base was added to the game with the fourth chapter of the "Secrets of the Syren" quest line, released with the "Publish 21", on August 4, 2005. The "Secrets of the Syren" story arc was removed from the game with the "Chapter 1", published on June 8, 2006, due to the major changes planed for Rori with the introduction of the Battle of Restuss.

In the fourth quest of the "Secrets of the Syren" arc, the player had to choose to work with either Rebel Officer Wolff Kalos or Imperial Officer M'Kae. This article assumes that the player was affiliated the Rebel Alliance. During the hunt for Cal Handro and the Syren spice on Rori, Rebel players had to attack an Imperial Base and kill Imperial General Brant Korra in order to collect incriminating evidence against Officer M'Kae. If the player instead chose the Empire, he/she would have to attack General Hadriin's base and kill Garax Hadriin to collect information about Wolff Kalos.
